## first steps

R
RStudio

[Keyboard shortcuts R Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/rviews/2017/01/27/january-17-tips-and-tricks/)

cmd + shift + M (%>%)
alt + - ( <- )
hold alt to select multiple cursore for editing
cmd + enter vs. ctrl + enter
cmd + shift + - (zoom out)
cmd + shift + 0 (zoom in)
ctrl + shift + O (outline)
Ctrl + Alt + I will insert an R chunk. (Never type ``` again!)
Ctrl + PageUp (fn and arrown up) and Ctrl + PageDown will navigate between chunks.
Ctrl + 1 for editor (script)
Ctrl + 2 for console
Alt + Shift + K
